title: Wedding Constructor

name: Name (Optional)
expiry_desc: Invitations remain active for 6 months after publishing. You'll receive an automatic reminder 15 days before expiration.
not_active: This URL is not active yet. It will become accessible after publishing.
date_preview: Important: Date Cannot Be Changed After Publishing
date_preview_rule: Once you publish your invitation, the event date will be permanently locked and cannot be modified. Please ensure your date is correct:
date_preview_rule2: If you need to change the date, please go back and update it before publishing.
legal_understand: . I understand that the invitation date cannot be changed after publishing and that my invitation will expire 6 months after publication.
choose_one_desc: Each invitation is carefully crafted so you feel like you’re sending a piece of art to your guests.
choose_two_title: Guest list management directly on the platform
choose_two_desc: Easily manage and download your guest list in the required format
choose_three_desc: Guests can view and respond to the invitation on their phone, computer, or tablet
choose_four_desc: All invitations are available in Armenian, English, and Russian. You can choose one or multiple languages at no extra cost
choose_five_title: Share event photos with your guests with one click
choose_five_desc: After the event, share your photos directly inside the invitation
create_title: Create your wedding invitation yourself — in just 5 minutes
create_subtitle: Simply follow a few easy steps
create_one_desc: Select one of our signature designs and choose a color palette
create_two_desc: Add the event date, agenda, photos. Edit texts, choose invitation languages, and more
footer_about: AllSet was created to transform the entire event planning experience in Armenia. Our vision is to become a complete digital assistant for events, where everything is possible on one platform — fast, beautiful, and stress-free.
plan_title:
Start planning
Your unforgettable day with us —
plan_desc: Every beautiful story begins with an invitation. On the Allset event planning platform, creating invitations becomes an easy and enjoyable process. Create your digital invitation — without unnecessary hassle…
plan_desc_two: Special offers — tailored to your choice
plan_desc_three: Our invitations are designed to combine modern trends with wedding elegance, creating a unique design for every couple.
choose_desc_two: Our story began with a simple and sincere meeting, which over time became the most important decision of our lives. Every smile, every conversation, and every moment spent together brought us closer to each other. We learned to listen, understand, and support one another, sharing both joys and challenges. Today, with love and confidence, we begin a new chapter of our lives hand in hand. For us, family means warmth, respect, and memories created together. We are happy to share this beautiful day of our lives with you, in the presence of our loved ones and friends, because your love and support are our greatest strength.
story_title: Beautiful stories begin with an invitation.
faqs_description: Find quick answers to the most common questions related to creation and receiving.
faqs_one_title: How to create my invitation on AllSet?
faqs_one_text: Creating a digital invitation on Allset.am takes just a few minutes. Simply sign up, choose a design, fill in details — names, photos, schedule, and more, pay online, and start inviting guests immediately after payment.
faqs_two_title: Can I also print the invitation?
faqs_two_text: We offer digital invitations only. If you need a print-ready file, please contact us.
faqs_three_title: What features do allset.am invitations offer?
faqs_three_text: Our digital invitations are not only beautiful but also functional: you can track guest responses, manage your guest list through a convenient interface, and share event photos directly in the invitation. Our invitations are innovative and designed to simplify event planning.
faqs_four_title: Can I change the invitation design colors and texts?
faqs_four_text: Of course — and it’s very easy. Each invitation includes pre-designed color options created by our experienced designers. Invitation texts are available in three languages, without requiring extra time for translations.
available_description: AllSet was created to transform the entire event planning experience in Armenia. Our vision is to become a complete digital assistant for events, where everything is possible on one platform — fast, beautiful, and stress-free.
available_one_desc: Create a personalized digital invitation without unnecessary hassle.
available_two_desc: Edit colors, texts, and languages — even after the invitation is activated.
available_three_desc: After sending invitations, manage your guest list with ease.
feedback: A little love from our clients
feature_one_desc: From venues to photographers, planners, and decoration teams…
feature_two_desc: From guest management to budget tracking and an AI-powered assistant
feature_three_desc: Explore other events and discover unique ideas for your own
